Class LibrarySystem

LibrarySystem
public class LibrarySystem extends Object
Contians the main method, this is the front end user interference

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Creates and runs the Library System

    • mainMenu

      public int mainMenu()
      Displays the menu for the application,reads the menu option that the user entered and returns it.
      Returns:
      the users menu choice

    • run

      public void run()
      Displays the menu and processes the user's menu choice. Option ‘0’ exits the program.

    • patronMenu

      public int patronMenu()
      Displays the menu for the runPatron() method. It's used to show the user their options and store their choice.
      Returns:
      the users menu choice

    • runPatron

      public void runPatron()
      Displays the menu with the Patron options and processes the user's patronMenu choice. Option ‘0’ goes back to main menu.

    • bookMenu

      public int bookMenu()
      Displays the menu for the runBook() method. It's used to show the user their options and store their choice.
      Returns:
      the users menu choice

    • runBook

      public void runBook()
      Displays the menu with the Book options and processes the user's bookMenu choice. Option ‘0’ goes back to main menu.

    • borrowedPatronMenu

      public int borrowedPatronMenu()
      Displays the first menu for the runBorrowed() method. It's used to let the user select the patron with validation that the choice is appropriate that will be used to determine whose borrowed books are being interacted with.
      Returns:
      the users menu choice

    • borrowedMenu

      public int borrowedMenu(Patron patron)
      Displays the second menu for the runBorrowed() method. It's used to show the user which Patrons books they're interacting with as well as their options for how they can interact with them.
      Returns:
      the users menu choice

    • runBorrowed

      public void runBorrowed()
      Displays two menus, one to select which Patrons borrowed books to interact with and another showing how the books can be interacted with, and processes the user's choices. Option ‘0’ goes back to Patron menu.

    • borrowBook

      public void borrowBook(Patron patron)
      Borrows a book. It takes in a patron, checks for available books and if there are any shows a list of them. The user selects the index of the book they want to borrow, this index is validated(consists of only digits, isn't bigger than the highest position in the arraylist and checks if the book associated with that index is available), the book of their choice has it's validity changed to unavailable and a copy of it is created in the Patrons borrowed books arraylist. The changes are then saved automatically.

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(Patron patron)
      Returns a book. Takes in a patron and if the patron has any books borrowed asks the patron which book they'd like to return. Has validation to make sure the users choice is a number and isn't greater than the highest index in the arraylist. It uses the selected book to check its ID and searches through the bookList to find a book with the same ID. It changes that books avail to true and removes the copy of the book from the patron's borrow arraylist

    • createPatron

      public void createPatron()
      Creates a new patron and automatically saves it

    • createBook

      public void createBook()
      Creates a new book and automatically saves it

    • deletePatron

      public void deletePatron()
      Deletes a selected Patron. Stops if there aren't any patrons to be deleted or if the user attempts to delete a Patron that is currenlty borrowing a book. Saves automatically afterwards.

    • deleteBook

      public void deleteBook()
      Deletes a selected Book. Stops if there aren't any books to be deleted or if the user attempts to delete a Book that is currenlty borrowed. Saves automatically afterwards.

    • copyBook

      public void copyBook()
      Creates a copy of a book but with a different ID and availability set to true. Saves automatically at the end

    • listOfPatronsByName

      public void listOfPatronsByName()
      Makes a list of all Patrons that have the entered Name

    • listOfBooksByTitle

      public void listOfBooksByTitle()
      Makes a list of all Books that have the entered Title

    • updateBookDetails

      public void updateBookDetails()
      Updates Book details, not functional so it just displays a message saying so

    • updatePatronDetails

      public void updatePatronDetails()
      Updates Patron details, not functional so it just displays a message saying so
